description:
Google Play is at the heart of the Android ecosystem, providing the apps, games, and digital content that bring Android devices to life. The Play store serves over 2 billion users in 190 markets, and is a critical driver of Google’s overall business growth. The mission of our Growth Marketing team is to create marketing programs that cultivate valuable relationships with our diverse user base, increasing engagement and building happier, more loyal users.

As a Program Manager for Growth Marketing, you'll work cross-functionally in driving successful outcomes from transformational change. You will be leading complex change over multiple quarters, focusing on quality outcomes and lasting benefits for the Growth Marketing program.

Google Play offers music, movies, books, apps and games for your devices, powered by the cloud. It’s a Google approach to entertainment, syncing magically across your devices and on the web. As part of the Android and Mobile team, Googlers working on Google Play do everything from engineering our backend systems, to shaping the product strategy, to forming great content partnerships. They make it possible for people to do things like buy an ebook or song on their Android phone, then have it instantly available on their laptop. The Google Play team helps strengthen the overall Android ecosystem by giving developers and partners a premium store where they can reach millions of users.

qualifications:
Minimum qualifications:

  • BA/BS degree or equivalent practical experience.
  • 10 years of relevant experience in program/project management, product management, strategic consulting, and/or marketing coordination.
  • Experience operating within and leading cross-functional teams.
  • Experience implementing scalable process improvements.

Preferred qualifications:

  • MBA degree.
  • Knowledge in the areas of HTML, Mobile technologies, SQL and database familiarity.
  • Ability to thrive in a fast-paced environment, managing multiple complex projects with various deadlines simultaneously.
  • Effective business judgment, and professional distinction in thought leadership and innovation, paired with demonstrated communication skills.
  • Demonstrated problem-solving/analytical skills.
responsibilities:
• Lead the Play Growth Marketing roster from planning through maintenance.
  • Support technical and operational needs to ensure deliverables are on time and within budget.
  • Conceive and operationalize programs that require aligning cross-functional teams on common business objectives. Manage key vendors across the globe.
  • Track and maintain cross-functional program plans and drive core team accountability to meet committed goals.
  • Communicate priorities, risks and schedules to key stakeholders and leadership. Manage annual and quarterly planning processes.
title: Program Manager, Growth Marketing, Google Play
